import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Columns, Column, Image } from "@components"; import './UnPokemon.css' class UnPokemon extends Component { state = { loading: true, pokemon: null } async componentDidMount() { const url = 'https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/charizard' const response = await fetch(url) const data = await response.json() this.setState({ pokemon: data, loading: false }) console.log(this.state.pokemon.sprites.back_default) } render() { return (
{this.state.loading ? (
loading...
) : (

) } } export default UnPokemon
